item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Felipe Arruda. To check what I’m doing now, please go to my Now page.

item.title: What I'm doing now
item.description: On this page, you can find projects I’m involved with as of Thursday, 14th October 2021. On my PhD Rest of my life I got the idea of this page on Annanda’s website.
